dcterms:creator: Q. Meng
W. Shi
S. Li
L. Zhang
dcterms:description: WorldView-3 (WV3) dataset contains 9714 training samples and 1080 validation samples, each consisting of a PAN/LRMS/GT image pair of size 64 × 64 × 1, 16 × 16 × 8, and 64 × 64 × 8, respectively. The PAN image has a spatial resolution of 0.3m, while the LRMS image has a spatial resolution of 1.2m.
dcterms:title: WorldView-3 (WV3)

dcterms:creator: Q. Meng
W. Shi
S. Li
L. Zhang
dcterms:description: GaoFen-2 (GF2) dataset contains 19809 training samples and 2201 validation samples, each consisting of a PAN/LRMS/GT image pair of sizes 64 × 64 × 1, 16 × 16 × 4, and 64 × 64 × 4, respectively. The PAN images have a spatial resolution of 0.8m, while the LRMS images have a spatial resolution of 3.2m.
dcterms:title: GaoFen-2 (GF2)

dcterms:creator: A. Guo
R. Dian
S. Li
dcterms:description: GF5-GF1 dataset contains hyperspectral images (HSIs) and multispectral images (MSIs), where the spatial size of MSIs is twice that of HSIs. The dataset is used for hyperspectral image fusion.
dcterms:title: GF5-GF1
